properties.name: kio.default-pfp-key
properties.description: Id that represents the default profile picture in s3 profile picture bucket

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.id
properties.description: Id of the InMemory OAuth client

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.secret
properties.description: Secret of the InMemory OAuth client

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.access-token-validity-time
properties.description: Time expressed in seconds that represents how much an access token will be active

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.refresh-token-validity-time
properties.description: Time expressed in seconds that represents how much an access token will be active

properties.name: aws.s3.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint to connect to s3 through localstack

properties.name: aws.s3.files-bucket
properties.description: Name of the bucket in which all users 's files will be saved

properties.name: aws.s3.profile-pictures-bucket
properties.description: Name of the bucket in which all profile pictures will be saved
